import './profile.css' import avatarDefaul from '../../assets/avatar.png' import {FiSettings, FiUpload} from 'react-icons/fi' import Header from '../../components/Header' import Title from '../../components/Title' import { useState, useContext } from 'react' import {AuthContext} from '../../contexts/auth' export default function Profile() { // Context const { user } = useContext( AuthContext ) // Estados const [nome, setNome] = useState(user && user.nome) const [email, setEmail] = useState(user && user.email) const [avatarUrl, setAvatarUrl] = useState(user && user.avatarUrl) return (
<FiSettings size={25}/>
setNome(e.target.value) }/>
); }
